actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for a change in the titles of the NASA Associate Administrator positions listed under level V of the Executive Schedule, and to add three more such positions to such schedule.

summary.text: Classifies the National Aeronautics and Space Administration Associate Administrator positions listed under level V of the Executive Schedule as Associate Administrators, and adds three more such positions to such schedule. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5316)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for a change in the titles of the NASA Associate Administrator positions listed under level V of the Executive Schedule, and to add three more such positions to such schedule.
